title: Group sorting by numFound
description: Right now in 6.1.2 there doesn't seem to be a way to sort documents by numFound when grouped by a field. We're looking for this feature and can't implement it since numFound isn't a valid field. We've looked for alternatives but haven't found any. Please include this feature in the next release or direct us towards an alternative.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Patches are always welcome. By their nature, Open Source projects are driven by user needs (thus contributions). If you have a great enough need to invest the time and energy in a patch we'd be glad to guide you in its creation and, if accepted by the community, add it to the code base.
